OS_Planetary_Condition_desc.thin_atmosphere_ACCESSIBILTY_BONUS: due to the thin athmosphere, station and ships are able to safely orbit this planet much closer to the surface making the transport of good and people simpler and faster
OS_Planetary_Condition_desc.thin_athmophere_HEAVY_MACHINERUY_DEMAND: Atmosphere Pump run here all day making the few habitation become habitable for people living on this world
OS_Planetary_Condition_desc.thin_athmophere_METAL_DEMAND: Metal is required here for the construction, and repair of the many decompression chamber and habitat
